ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Everyone on it will pass away;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: All that is on the earth is passing,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: All that is on earth will perish,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Everyone on earth is destined to die.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: For everything on the earth is extinction.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Whatsoever is on it (the earth) will perish.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Everyone on it must pass away.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: All that dwells upon the earth is perishing,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Everyone that is thereon will pass away;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: All that is on the earth is doomed to perish,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Everyone that is thereon will Pass away.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: All that is on earth will perish:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Whatsoever is on it (the earth) will perish.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: All that live on it will perish.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Everyone upon the earth will perish,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [55:26] Everyone who is on it, that is, [on] the earth, of animal beings, will perish (man, ‘who’, is used to indicate predominance of rational beings);
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Everyone that is thereon) on the face of the earth (will pass away) will die; it is also said that this means: everyone upon it will vanish; and it is also said that this means: every act that is done for other than Allah will perish; 634
